WRITING.TEXT: I realised I had a problem when I ate one bite of toast, threw it back up then had a panic attack when I was faced with stepping outside. Anorexia isn't helped by the media, it's blurred the lines. All I can say is, it's obvious when you see it. So 99% your friend is fine :) if he's eating then that's okay!

It was 3400, my grandparents paid for it as my nan wanted me to have it done before she passed away. Lost her in October, the week before it was done unfortunately. Another thing I cannot thank them enough for!
